PlanPageAccountDetailPage: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentAccountHeader: Add test entries for AccountHeader (account name, category label, New Transaction button, search bar)
PlanComponentBudgetOverview: Add test entries for BudgetOverview (progress bar, actual vs budgeted amounts, percentage used)
PlanComponentTransactionsTab: Add test entries for TransactionsTab (table with Date/Description/Amount/Direction/Actions columns, View/Edit links, tab switching)
PlanComponentBudgetDetailsTab: Add test entries for BudgetDetailsTab (budget line items with actual/budgeted, progress bars per item)
PlanComponentReportingLinks: Add test entries for ReportingLinks (Actual vs Budget Report link, Transaction History Report link)
PlanPageNewTransactionModal: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentTransactionHeaderFields: Add test entries for TransactionHeaderFields (date picker, description input, currency dropdown)
PlanComponentLineItemsTable: Add test entries for LineItemsTable (account dropdown, type Credit/Debit dropdown, amount input, delete row button, Add Line Item button)
PlanComponentBalanceIndicator: Add test entries for BalanceIndicator (total debits/credits display, Transaction is Balanced/Unbalanced indicator, validation prevents saving unbalanced)
PlanComponentTagsInput: Add test entries for TagsInput (add tags, remove tags with X, optional field)
PlanPageCreateReportDialog: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentReportTypeSelector: Add test entries for ReportTypeSelector (Summary Overview, Detailed Transactions, Budget vs Actual tabs)
PlanComponentDateRangeSelector: Add test entries for DateRangeSelector (start/end date pickers, This Month/Last Quarter/YTD preset buttons)
PlanComponentAccountCategoryFilter: Add test entries for AccountCategoryFilter (tree checkboxes for Assets/Liabilities/Equity/Revenue/Expenses with sub-categories, Include Zero Balance toggle)

PlanComponentReportPreview: Add test entries for ReportPreview (preview table with Category/Account/Budget/Actual/Variance/Variance%, Refresh Preview button, expandable account rows, Cancel and Generate Report buttons)
PlanPageReportDetails: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentReportHeader: Add test entries for ReportHeader (report title with ID, breadcrumb navigation, Export PDF button, Export CSV button)
PlanComponentVarianceSummary: Add test entries for VarianceSummary (Total Variance with arrow, Actual Spend, Budgeted Spend, mini trend chart)
PlanComponentVarianceChart: Add test entries for VarianceChart (bar chart showing Actual vs Budgeted per account, account labels on x-axis)
PlanComponentDetailedReportTable: Add test entries for DetailedReportTable (Account/Item, Actual, Budget, Variance $, Variance %, Trend sparkline, Actions View button, expandable sub-item rows)
PlanPageReportList: Decide on components, add sections to docs/tests.md
PlanComponentReportListHeader: Add test entries for ReportListHeader (page title, search bar, Generate New Report button)
PlanComponentReportTable: Add test entries for ReportTable (Report Name sortable column, Type, Date Range, Accounts Included, Status badge, Actions with refresh/download/View Details, pagination)
